00018 //BibleTime includes
00019 #include "cswordlexiconmoduleinfo.h"
00020 #include "frontend/cbtconfig.h"
00021 
00022 //Qt includes
00023 #include <qfile.h>
00024 #include <qdatastream.h>
00025 
00026 //Sword includes
00027 #include <swmodule.h>
00028 
00029 #include <kglobal.h>
00030 #include <kstandarddirs.h>
00031 
00032 //Change it once the format changed to make all
00033 //systems rebuild their caches
00034 #define CACHE_FORMAT "2"
00035 
00036 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::CSwordLexiconModuleInfo( SWModule* module) : CSwordModuleInfo(module) {
00037     m_entryList = 0;
00038 }
00039 
00040 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::CSwordLexiconModuleInfo( const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo& m ) : CSwordModuleInfo(m) {
00041     delete m_entryList;
00042     m_entryList = 0;    
00043         
00044     if (m.m_entryList) {
00045         m_entryList = new QStringList();
00046         *m_entryList = *m.m_entryList;//copy list items
00047     }
00048 }
00049 
00050 CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::~CSwordLexiconModuleInfo(){
00051     delete m_entryList;
00052     m_entryList = 0;
00053 }
00054 
00056 QStringList* const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::entries(){
00057   qWarning("QStringList* const CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::entries() #");
00058     if (!module())
00059         return 0;
00060 
00061 //  Q_ASSERT(m_entryList);
00062   if (!m_entryList) {
00063         m_entryList = new QStringList();
00064 
00065     const bool lexiconCache = CBTConfig::get(CBTConfig::lexiconCache);
00066         bool read = false;
00067 
00068         if (lexiconCache){
00069         QFile f1(
00070             QString::fromLatin1("%1/%2")
00071                 .arg(KGlobal::dirs()->saveLocation("data", "bibletime/cache/"))
00072                 .arg( name() )
00073         );
00074         
00075       if ( f1.open( IO_ReadOnly ) ){
00076         QDataStream s( &f1 );
00077             QString mod_ver, prog_ver;
00078         s >> mod_ver;
00079         s >> prog_ver;
00080             if (mod_ver == config(ModuleVersion) && prog_ver == CACHE_FORMAT) {
00081                 s >> *m_entryList;
00082                 read = true;
00083             }
00084             f1.close();
00085       }
00086         }
00087 
00088     if (!read){
00089             (*module()) = TOP;
00090         do {
00091         if (isUnicode())
00092                 m_entryList->append(QString::fromUtf8(module()->KeyText()));
00093         else //latin1 is a lot faster than UTF8, use it because latin1 modules won't contain unicode keys
00094           m_entryList->append(QString::fromLatin1(module()->KeyText()));
00095             (*module())++;
00096         } while ( !module()->Error() );
00097             (*module()) = TOP;
00098 
00099         if (m_entryList->first().stripWhiteSpace().isEmpty())
00100             m_entryList->remove( m_entryList->begin() );            
00101 
00102             if (lexiconCache){
00103             //create cache
00104                 QString dir = KGlobal::dirs()->saveLocation("data", "bibletime/cache/");
00105         QFile f2( QString::fromLatin1("%1/%2").arg(dir).arg( name() ) );
00106         if (f2.open( IO_WriteOnly )){
00107           QDataStream s( &f2 );
00108                 s << config(CSwordModuleInfo::ModuleVersion); //store module version
00109                     s << QString::fromLatin1(CACHE_FORMAT); //store BT version -- format may change
00110                 s << *m_entryList;
00111               f2.close();
00112         }
00113             }
00114         }
00115     }   
00116     return m_entryList;
00117 }
00118 
00120 const bool CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::snap(){
00121     if(module()->getRawEntry()){    //snap to the current entry
00122         return true;
00123     }
00124     return false;
00125 }
00126 
00128 CSwordModuleInfo* CSwordLexiconModuleInfo::clone(){
00129     return new CSwordLexiconModuleInfo(*this);
00130 }
